alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 6:38AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central San Diego County through 715 AM PDT... At 638 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rancho San Diego, or 10 miles southeast of El Cajon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potrero, Campo, Skye Valley, Jamul, Barrett Lake, Dulzura, Japatul Valley and Otay Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
